vehicles.description: A yellow lifting platform truck positioned on the right side of the road, with part of its platform extended over the roadway
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle is engaged in work activities that partially block the right side of the road, which may create an obstacle for the ego car

vulnerable_road_users.description: Multiple pedestrians on both sides of the road, some near the ego car's trajectory
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Pedestrians close to the driving path pose potential hazards, necessitating careful maneuvering and readiness to stop if needed.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Individual in a high-visibility jacket standing in the road, facing away from the ego vehicle
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: This person could be a construction worker directing traffic or walking unexpectedly into the lane, so the ego car should slow down and prepare to stop or follow hand signals.

suggestions: The ego car should slow down and be prepared to stop for pedestrians, especially considering their close proximity to the road and the presence of the work truck. The vehicle should possibly switch to the left lane if it is safe and permitted, to avoid the area where the lifting platform is extending into the road. Additionally, the ego car should maintain vigilance for any further instructions or signs from the road workers or possible temporary traffic control devices that might not be visible in this image.
